title: Implement CLI-level lease enforcement
description:
Add `require_active_lease()` check in `CommandExecutor` before structural operations that modify existing issues: update/delete issue, add/remove deps, add/remove gates, change state.

**IMPORTANT:** Issue creation (`jit issue create`) is EXEMPTED from lease requirement because it allocates a new ULID that cannot conflict. See design doc section "Issue Creation Workflow".

Support configurable enforcement modes (off/warn/strict). See design doc sections "CLI-Level Enforcement" and "Read vs Write Operations".
